name: PK PROJECT
description:
PK PROJECT: ACT 1

Escape from Catral.

 Takahiro, Yuta's new cellmate, turns out to be a rather "special" guy

and has no intention of staying in Catral prison one minute longer.

Will the two be able to escape from this godforsaken island?

 

First chapter of 4 of a visual novel with point-and-click elements and QTE battles,which will engage you in the world of PK PROJECT with insights, secrets and choices (even vital ones!)

 

Languages available: Italian, English.

 

Game Dev, Art & Story: Bruzzechesse Clara aka "Play"

Music: Bruzzechesse Clara aka "Play" with Ecrettmusic
